framework.api

Interface IView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISignalListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DialogView, LayersDialogView, PanelView, ProjectDialogView, ProjectView, PropertiesDialogView, ScrollView, TileMapDialogView, TileMapView, TileView

    public interface IView
extends ISignalListener
    This contract specifies how views should operate within the framework.
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>
